originInfo.publisher: American Association for the Advancement of Science

mods.abstract: A three quarter mile long seine is laid out in the shallow waters of Barataria Bay near Manila Village. In Louisiana the seine is still an important method of catching shrimp.

titleInfo.title: Louisiana Sea Grant Digital Images Collection
